main event: On December 27, 1954, a civilian reported observing a round to cigar-shaped, yellow object in Long Beach, California.
interesting points: The object changed shape and brightness occasionally,The sighting lasted for an estimated duration of 5 minutes,The object was reported to have been flying at approximately 25,000 feet,No sound was reported during the observation,The observer indicated it could possibly be a balloon or aircraft due to insufficient data.
